About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do

Logic and Design: A Creative Problem-Solver

Hi, I'm Stav, a passionate web developer with a knack for design. My childhood exploration of web design and programming led me to discover my true calling during my third year of studies. Now, I'm actively refining my skills to become a Full-Stack/Frontend Developer through continuous learning and practice. Outside of coding, you'll find me indulging in diverse interests like dog-walking, learning languages, and exploring realms of economics, music, movies, advertising, and photography.

Volounteering

I've contributed my photography and graphic design and general assistance at 'Safsal Nettina' initiative, and at 'Matav' and 'Let Live' organizations. I also volunteered at the Tel Aviv Municipal Dog Shelter and encouraging more people to sign ADI cards to promote organ donation.

languages

I have a deep passion for language learning and a goal to achieve fluency in multiple languages, including Spanish and German. This love for languages has also motivated me to pursue the study of Hebrew sign language.

Photography

Photography has always held a special place in my heart as a beloved hobby. I pursued it by taking a course, working in a photo shop, and even choosing it as my major assignment in high school, allowing me to capture and convey stories through the lens.

Technical Skills
